Html:
Since I updated to the latest version I don't have the debug output from the cache-engine and the downloaded tiles anymore.
Is there a way to re-enable this somewhere? I'm afraid I can't find the right property...
thx

Because it enables me to see when (=at which part of a route) the tiles are loaded from local db/are downloaded from provider, when they are saved in the database (and when that is done).
It also displays (periodicly) how much space is already taken so i can deduce which part of the route takes how much space
Same for when users would wander around a bit on the map.

How do i enable debug? ----> Why do you need it? ----> [explanation] How should i do it? --------> use debug mode.
            ↑_________________________________________________________________________________________________________|              
          

If you know what i mean.

Dear Mr. Radioman,
can you plz explain to me how i can use debug mode...?

Yeah, i do that about 500 times a day.

I will try to explain my problem.

Using the old dlls i got this kind of output:
Thread[13] - Wait 0 - 01:49:11.6233125Thread[11] - tile loaded: 73KB, 12 - {X=2090,Y=1363}Thread[11] - Wait 1 - 01:49:11.6363133Thread[12] - tile loaded: 85KB, 12 - {X=2090,Y=1361}Thread[12] - Wait 2 - 01:49:11.6453138Invalidate delta: 217msResponse: http://e.maptile.maps.svc.ovi.com/maptiler/v2/maptile/newest/hybrid.day/14/8363/5452/256/png8EnqueueCacheTask: 1548269087 at zoom 14, pos: {X=8363,Y=5452}, CacheType:BothThread[14] - tile loaded: 49KB, 14 - {X=8363,Y=5452}Thread[14] - Wait 3 - 01:49:12.7503770Invalidate delta: 994msResponse: http://d.maptile.maps.svc.ovi.com/maptiler/v2/maptile/newest/hybrid.day/14/8364/5453/256/png8EnqueueCacheTask: 1548269087 at zoom 14, pos: {X=8364,Y=5453}, CacheType:BothThread[3] - tile loaded: 41KB, 14 - {X=8364,Y=5453}Thread[3] - Wait 4 - 01:49:12.8493826Thread[3] - OnTileLoadComplete: 2041ms, MemoryCacheSize: 6,26068782806396MBInvalidate delta: 210msCacheEngine: storing tile 1548269087 at zoom 14, pos: {X=8363,Y=5452}, CacheType:Both...CacheEngine: storing tile 1548269087 at zoom 14, pos: {X=8364,Y=5453}, CacheType:Both...CacheEngine: stop 

Using the new dlls i DO NOT GET THIS OUTPUT

I would like to have the output back.

Is this possible?

I am honestly truly absolutely convinced that i am building and running the program in debug mode (using vs2010). Configuration is (and has always been) set to debug, i click the 'play' button (start debugging) and have no clue where or how else i should define that i am debugging my projects. Same environment works for old dlls btw.
ok, instructions for dumbs: download the source(http://greatmaps.codeplex.com/SourceControl/list/changesets), open the solution, then set configuration to debug, click F5, enjoy ;}
